booking.question: How can I make a reservation?
booking.answer: You can book directly through our website or contact us via WhatsApp. We will send you a secure link to complete the payment and you will receive confirmation immediately.

checkin.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
checkin.answer: Check-in is from 4:00 pm and check-out until 11:00 am. If you need special times, contact us in advance and we will do our best to accommodate you.

cancellation.question: What is the cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: We offer free cancellation up to 48 hours before arrival. For later cancellations, the first night will be charged. In exceptional cases, we study each situation individually.

amenities.question: What services are included in the apartments?
amenities.answer: All our apartments include free WiFi, air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, bed linen and towels. Many also have a terrace or balcony with sea views.

pets.question: Are pets allowed?
pets.answer: Some of our apartments allow pets with a supplement of â‚¬15/night. It is necessary to inform us at the time of booking and follow our coexistence rules.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfer and PayPal. Payment is made securely through our platform integrated with AvaiBook.
